net.sf.tweety.logics.commons.analysis

Interface InconsistencyMeasure<T extends net.sf.tweety.commons.BeliefBase>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of belief bases this measure supports.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeliefSetInconsistencyMeasure, CcInconsistencyMeasure, CspInconsistencyMeasure, DefaultStreamBasedInconsistencyMeasure, DfInconsistencyMeasure, DHitInconsistencyMeasure, DMaxInconsistencyMeasure, DrasticInconsistencyMeasure, DSumInconsistencyMeasure, EtaInconsistencyMeasure, HsInconsistencyMeasure, MaInconsistencyMeasure, McscInconsistencyMeasure, MicInconsistencyMeasure, MiInconsistencyMeasure, NConsInconsistencyMeasure, NormalizedMicInconsistencyMeasure, NormalizedMiInconsistencyMeasure, PrInconsistencyMeasure, StreamBasedInconsistencyMeasure

    public interface InconsistencyMeasure<T extends net.sf.tweety.commons.BeliefBase>
    Classes implementing this interface represent inconsistency measures on belief bases.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double MEASURE_TOLERANCE
      Tolerance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Double inconsistencyMeasure(T beliefBase)
      This method measures the inconsistency of the given belief base.

        Tolerance.

    • Method Detail

      • inconsistencyMeasure

        Double inconsistencyMeasure(T beliefBase)
        This method measures the inconsistency of the given belief base.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - a belief base.
        Returns:
        a Double indicating the degree of inconsistency.
